projects.title: Audio to Text, and Translate
projects.description:
How to use it:

1) Click Record / Stop to start and stop your recording. Speak while recording
2) Click Record / Stop again to end the recording
3) Click Play / Stop to listen to your recording
4) Click Play / Stop again to stop playback
5) Click Save to save your recording
6) Click Transcription to generate a transcript of your recording
7) Enter the target language you want to translate to, then click Translate.

projects.title: AI Job Interview Practice Tool
projects.description:
How to use it:

1. Type Company and Role
2. Click each button to generate behavioral questions and technical / hypothetical questions to practice
3. Click answer guide button to review

projects.title: Document Upload and Extraction
projects.description: Vibe coding product, created in Cursor with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. This is actually a major feature of our Lawfully Pro product, designed to fully automate the workflow for law firms. I built the MVP to showcase the concept, improve my skills, and facilitate communication with the Engineering team.

projects.title: AI Resume Optimizer
projects.description:
This AI-powered resume optimization tool helps tailor your resume to a specific job description. Simply paste the job description into the JD section, enter the company‚Äôs website for deeper contextual relevance, and upload your resume. Then, click Optimize Resume.

The tool will update only the content of your bullet points and visually highlight the changes. You can easily copy and paste the modified bullet points back into your resume and reformat them as needed.

While I aimed to support downloads in the original file format, I haven't yet found a reliable solution for that ‚Äî further exploration is underway.
